text: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṃsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti
edit: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṃsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti

translations.transtext: Some senior monks give advices to [and] instruct ten monks, some give to twenty monks, some thirty, [and] some forty.
